Gift to Kim Jong Il from Bangladeshi Friendship Organization 
   Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The gift was handed to the DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh by Nuran Nabie, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, on Oct. 18.

Congratulations to Swedish PM and FM
   Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Fredrick Reinfeldt on his appointment as Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Sweden.
 Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs, sent a similar message to Carl Bildt on his appointment as foreign minister of Sweden.
